metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1652 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in nfsd4_ssc_setup_dul infs/nfsd/nfs4proc.c in the NFS filesystem in the Linux Kernel. This issuecould allow a local attacker to crash the system or it may lead to a kernelinformation leak problem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
